name: Biscotti Alla Panna Cream Biscuits Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare a lined baking tray and using a dessert spoon roll into small logs and make a few lines with a fork on the top. Brush with egg wash and sprinkle either Flaked almonds or Sprinkles. Bake at 200 Celsius for 18 mins or until golden brown. Allow to cool on a wire tray. They are best enjoyed dipped in coffee. Enjoy!
